DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of the study is to evaluate the changes in back pain from access to a sit-stand workstation. Other muscle and joint pain and/or discomfort will also be evaluated. We hypothesize that access to a sit-stand workstation will allow one to experience postural variation and reduce back pain.
DOC.brief_title: Access to a Sit-stand Computer Workstation and Back Pain
